citation.title: Chaplin: The Dictator and The Tramp

news.title: For a primer on how to make fun of Nazis, look to Charlie Chaplin
news.summary: White nationalists and neo-Nazis are having their moment. Former Ku Klux Klan Imperial Wizard David Duke is back, yet again, in the media spotlight, while newer figures such as white supremacist Richard Spencer and Christopher Cantwell are…
